https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/lOOK3i3fAIj6YiGE3sbN7q7R2Au.jpg A hilarious adventure of a 6-year-old orphan named Joy and a small wooden temple of disciples. During the great famine, the temple was engulfed in conflict and became the center of a martial showdown. Despite the drastic changes in the temple and the political arena, Joy somehow has become everyone's desire and is squeezed into the middle of all the chaos. Easy Life
